title: The 2024 Focus Paralane Looks Identical to the Izalco Max, but Prioritizes Comfort Over Efficiency
content:
The 2024 Focus Paralane mirrors the Izalco Max silhouette, combining its NACA tube shapes with a compliance-prioritizing carbon layup for endurance comfort.

Read the full article at The 2024 Focus Paralane Looks Identical to the Izalco Max, but Prioritizes Comfort Over Efficiency on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
